author: Malaz Nour
title: Ten Contemporary African Artists that Have Defied the Primary and Secondary Art Market Membrane
subtitle: In an art market landscape that has only recently begun to give African artists their flowers in both primary and secondary markets, these are ten artists that I have found myself inspired by and in awe of for their innovative yet familiar approaches to themes and concepts that span the African diaspora.
body: Between the primary and secondary art markets, the general representations of what African art is exist at near opposite ends of the spectrum...
